com.rscja.team.qcom.barcode

Class BarcodeUtility_qcom

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.rscja.team.qcom.barcode.BarcodeUtility_qcom
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IBarcodeUtility

    public class BarcodeUtility_qcom
extends java.lang.Object
implements IBarcodeUtility
    条码操作类 barcode operate class 注意： Attention: 1、使用前请确认您的机器已安装键盘助手v1.9.0 之后的版本。 1. Confirm keyboardeumulator v1.9.0 has been installed before using.
    Author:
    zhoupin
